definitions.example: I have a rendezvous with a friend in three weeks.

definitions.definition: An agreement to meet at a certain place and time.
definitions.example: “Get the party started at the rendezvous at oh six hours.”

definitions.definition: A place appointed for a meeting, or at which persons customarily meet.
The appointed place for troops, or for the ships of a fleet, to assemble; also, a place for enlistment.
A set of orbital maneuvers during which two spacecraft arrive at the same orbit and approach to a very close distance.
To meet at an agreed time and place.
definitions.example: Let's rendezvous at the bordello at 8:00 and go from there.
